short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your browser is your door to the internet, why not hang a Mezuzah?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your browser is your door to the internet, why not hang a Mezuzah? Ezuzah is your electronic Mezuzah. 

When you click the Ezuzah icon a small Mezuzah will appear and then disappear once you do anything else. That's it. Don't expect anything more interactive than a real Mezuzah. There is also a Mezuzah Klaf rolled (compressed image) inside the app package.
